summary: Adds Captain America as a follower outside Riverwood with a spare set of armor.
descriptionHtml:
This mod adds a unique follower to Skyrim, based on the Marvel character, Steve Rogers, Captain America, The Super Soldier, The First Avenger!

This is for Male Only.

You'll find him outside Riverwood. He will level with the player and is a 1 handed warrior but should just use his shield and has his own perks.

Furthermore, it adds an second set of armor.

***************************************************
The Armour:
Based around the Blades armour retextured with the red, white and blue scheme of Captain America. It's unenchanted, and can only be crafted under the Iron section of the Sky Forge, and tempered as usual at the workbench. Stat-wise it's a little stronger than Blades.
Note the set is standalone, and not a replacer of the Blades armour. Although it's based on the iconic Captain America suit of Marvel, i've attempted to make it look more armor based, more in keeping with Skyrim. It's about as lore-friendly as you can get.

The Weapon - Shield:
Based on the Dawnguard Shiel retextured with the red, white and blue scheme of Captain America's Shield. It's unenchanted, and can only be crafted under the iron section of the Sky Forge, and tempered as usual at the smithing table. Stat-wise it's a little stronger than the Dawnguard Shield.
Note is is standalone, and not a replacer of Dawnguard Shield. Although it's based Captain america's Shield of Marvel, i've attempted to make it look more like a weapon from Skyrim. It's about as lore-friendly as you can get.

**************************************************
Compatibility & Troubleshooting
This mod reqiures Dawnguard DLC's.

The armour should not conflict with anything else.
**************************************************

Installation:
Simply extract the archive into the Skyrim folder, so the .esp, textures folder, and meshes folder all land into your skyrim/data directory.
Typically:
C:/Program Files/Steam/steamapps/common/skyrim

C:/Program Files (x86)/Steam/steamapps/common/skyrim
